channel.title: gSwitch App Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: 1.8.0 Fixed multiple bugs, added support for dark mode, added override mode
item.description: - Added support for dark mode - Fixed truncated labels (namely for german translations) - Updated Sparkle to 1.21.3 - Updated SwiftyBeaver to 1.7.0 - Built on Swift 5 - Changed target SDK to 10.14 - Added mode to allow integrated only even if there are gpu dependencies
